Description:
Sales Representative in a Plastic FactoryResponsibilities:Identifying and prospecting potential customers in the target market.
Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing and new customers.
Understanding customer needs and requirements and presenting appropriate product solutions.
Conducting product presentations and demonstrations to showcase the features and benefits of plastic products.
Negotiating and closing sales deals, ensuring customer satisfaction and achieving sales targets.
Collaborating with internal teams, such as production and logistics, to ensure timely delivery of products to customers.
Monitoring market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify business opportunities and improve sales strategies.Skills
Skills:
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively engage with customers.
Strong sales and negotiation skills to persuade and close deals.
Technical knowledge of plastic products and their applications.
Ability to understand and analyze customer needs and provide tailored solutions.
Self-motivated and result-oriented, with a proactive approach to sales.
Organizational and time management skills to handle multiple customers and meet sales targets.
Problem-solving skills to address customer inquiries or concerns.
Proficiency in using sales and CRM software for tracking leads and managing customer relationships.
